deviceTimeError.message: You cannot log in because the clock on your device is off by more than 5 minutes. Adjust the clock and try again.

permissionRequestDenied.message: You need to approve our request to access your Tunnistamo profile in order to use this service. Please try logging in again.

genericError.message: An error occured while logging in. Please try again

berthErrors.explanation: You cannot delete your information because Boat berths service needs your information for billing. Contact the customer service of Berth service to terminate your contract. After that has been done, you can try again.
berthErrors.title: The operation cannot be completed.

confirmationModal.saveMessage: The information you have changed is immediately available to the following City of Helsinki services:
confirmationModal.saveTitle: Do you want to save your changes?

createProfile.heading: Fill in your details to create a profile
createProfile.helpText: By creating a profile you can manage your information in one place.

deleteProfile.accept: I understand what deleting my data means and wish to proceed.
deleteProfile.explanation: If you want, you can delete all the data we hold on you. Once deleted, the data cannot be restored. If you have linked your profile to a City of Helsinki service, you will no longer be able to use that service until you create a new profile. After the deletion, you will be automatically logged out of this service. If you have used a third-party service provider account (such as Google or Facebook) to log in, that account will not be deleted.
deleteProfile.title: Do you want to delete your information?
deleteProfile.loadingServices: Searching for services connected to the profile

deleteProfileModal.explanation: By continuing you will lose all of your stored data and you can no longer use the following City of Helsinki services:
deleteProfileModal.noServiceExplanation: By continuing you will lose all of your stored data.
deleteProfileModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your information?

deleteProfileErrorModal.notAllowed: You cannot delete your profile because one of the services using it needs your information, for example, for invoicing.
deleteProfileErrorModal.title: The deletion failed!
deleteProfileErrorModal.genericError: The profile could not be deleted. Please try again later.

downloadData.panelText: If you want to see all our stored information about you, you can download them here. The information will be delivered as a file in a fixed format so you can move it into some other system if you want to.
downloadData.panelTitle: Do you want to download your information?

navigation.language: Language: English. Change language. Vaihda kieli. Ändra språk.

login.description: By signing in to the new Helsinki city services, a Helsinki profile is created for you. Here you can easily find your profile information and see all the services you have signed in with it.
login.title: Your profile information in one address!

nav.titleAriaLabel: Go to homepage of the Profile

notification.defaultErrorText: Something went wrong. Try again after a while.

profile.loadErrorText: Failed to retrieve profile! Try to retrieve it again or log out.

profileDeleted.message: You can recreate it later if you want. You will be logged out after {{time}} seconds.
profileDeleted.title: Your profile has been successfully removed!

profileForm.makeEmailPrimary: Change to your primary email address
profileForm.makePhonePrimary: Change to your primary phone number
profileForm.termsLabel: I have read the service's file description and the city's data protection principles
profileForm.terms: Read <fileDescriptionLink>file description</fileDescriptionLink> and  city's <dataProtectionLink>data protection principles</dataProtectionLink>

profileInformation.description: The Helsinki profile enables you to use your data in all City of Helsinki online services that require authentication. One set of data, easily accessible on various services.
profileInformation.name: Name
profileInformation.title: My information
profileInformation.visibility: The following information about you is stored in Helsinki profile.
profileInformation.primaryPhoneAriaDescription: This is your primary phone number
profileInformation.verifiedDataInformation: The marked data have been confirmed from the national Population Information System and therefore cannot be edited in your Helsinki profile. If you want, you can view your personal data stored in the Population Information System in the suomi.fi web service: <suomiFiLink>go to the suomi.fi service </suomiFiLink>
profileInformation.verifiedDataInformationForScreenReaders: The data below have been confirmed from the national Population Information System and therefore cannot be edited in your Helsinki profile. If you want, you can view your personal data stored in the Population Information System in the suomi.fi web service: <suomiFiLink>go to the suomi.fi service </suomiFiLink>
profileInformation.ariaComboBoxHelperText: Select {{field}}. Search by typing and select one option. {{requiredInfo}}
profileInformation.ariaListTitlePhones: Phone numbers that you have provided
profileInformation.ariaListTitleEmails: Email addresses that you have provided
profileInformation.noPhones: You haven't given any phone numbers
profileInformation.noEmail: You have not entered an email address.
profileInformation.verifyEmailText: We have sent a verification email to the email address you have entered. Your email address is also your login ID, so you will not be able to log in unless you have verified your ID. If you did not receive the verification email, please check your junk mail folder.

serviceConnections.empty: You currently don't have any services connected to your profile.
serviceConnections.explanation: You have granted the following services the right to use the data stored on your Helsinki profile.
serviceConnections.servicePersonalData: Information which the service will know about you:
serviceConnections.title: Services with permission to use your data

validation.email: The value must be an email-address.
validation.maxLength: This field can be max {{max}} characters.
validation.phoneMin: The number must be at least {{min}} characters long.
validation.errorTitleForScreenReaders: The form has the following errors:
validation.countryCallingCodeRequiredIfNumber: Country code is required with phone number

pageNotFoundText: Check the spelling of the URL (upper and lower case letters and punctuation marks). Or click the Back button on your browser to return to the previous page. You can also go to the front page via the link below.
